body_html:
@gunan - for windwos cudnn6 is fine, builds and all unit tests are passing.
All that is needed is to point cmake to the cudnn6 location

set CUDNN_HOME=C:\local\cudnn-8.0-windows10-x64-v6.0\cuda
cmake -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME=%CUDNN_HOME%
body_text:
@gunan - for windwos cudnn6 is fine, builds and all unit tests are passing.
All that is needed is to point cmake to the cudnn6 location
set CUDNN_HOME=C:\local\cudnn-8.0-windows10-x64-v6.0\cuda
cmake -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME=%CUDNN_HOME%
body:
@gunan - for windwos cudnn6 is fine, builds and all unit tests are passing. 
All that is needed is to point cmake to the cudnn6 location

```
set CUDNN_HOME=C:\local\cudnn-8.0-windows10-x64-v6.0\cuda
cmake -Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON -DCUDNN_HOME=%CUDNN_HOME% 
```
